#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,ans,n,i,y;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=2;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		y=n;
		for(i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(n%i==0)
			{
				ans=i;
				while(n%i==0)
				n/=i;
			}
		}
		//printf("ans=%d\n",ans);
		if(n>1)
		ans=ans>n?ans:n;
		printf("%d\n",y/ans);
	}
}
